node.html: A complete redesign and re-implementation of the website for the Trill Project app.
A simple timer mobile app to help you focus on tasks and keep track of what tasks you have completed.
Create an account, upload images for Clarafai API to detect faces in, then keep track of how many faces you've detected and compare your score to other users'.
A website, designed and built from scratch, showcasing the mission, features, team, and news for an app dedicated to improving mental health.
The first iteration of my personal website/portfolio, which helped me learn the JS-HTML-CSS stack.
A web app that condenses political information, then brings candidates into your living room via augmented reality.
A platform that helps predict and check your loved ones' mental health and mood with the Fitbit API and machine learning.
A gamified web app that makes living a sustainable life and fighting environmental issues enjoyable with an adorable companion. Winner at Hack for the People 2020!
An art web app that allows users to paint pixelated version of images, including their own uploaded images, in a paint by numbers style.
An interactive game where users must pose for the camera to move around a house and get rid of a virus. Check out the Devpost submission video.
